idea-plugin.name: One Dark Two Theme
idea-plugin.description:
Fresh Reimagining of the One Dark theme for JetBrains IDEs

One Dark Two is my interpretation of the One Dark theme with more contrast. This repository is based on the code by:

  • catpuccin/jetbrains
  • one-dark/jetbrains-one-dark-theme
  • subtheme-dev/atom-one

Usage

There are 2 variants for you to choose from: Fresh and Classic.

User Interface

  • Head to Settings → Appearance & Behaviour → Appearance
  • Pick your variant
  • (Optional) Restart your IDE

Code Editor

  • Head to Settings → Editor → Color Scheme
  • Pick your variant
  • (Optional) Restart your IDE

Help

For further help, see also:
